biotools.summary: patcHwork is a user-friendly web-server that identifies amino acids of proteins that undergo a charge-shift when the pH assumes two user-defined values. For sequence functionality, users may submit a FASTA file with up to ten thousand amino acid sequences (max 20MB). For structure functionality, users may submit a single 3D structure (PDB) file or a zip file with multiple PDB files (max 20MB) for batch processing.
